arts.ttl: Liverpool travel to Manchester City, Premier League buildup and more – matchday live
arts.sum: News, discussion and previews before the day’s action Jonathan Wilson’s preview | Email matchday live Will Unwin got to sit down with Liverpool’s hottest striker. What other guidance has Slot offered Ekitiké? “Obviously keep my shirt on,” he says with a smile. “I would say he’s on my back, but not for a bad thing. He just wants to help me, so I don’t take that badly. He wants me to give more and more. Maybe sometimes you feel like it’s a little bit too much and you want to complain. It’s a good thing because I think if a coach doesn’t like you, he will not speak to you or not try to get the best of you.” Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Liverpool has a secret weapon against Manchester City that can lead the Reds to victory
arts.sum: I f Liverpool is going to take down Pep Guardiola's Manchester City again this weekend, the most dangerous weapon in the Reds ' arsenal is already well-known - and the Cityzens still haven't found a way to solve him. Every time Liverpool and City meet, Salah shows up.
